name: Vexus
overview: Vexus is a 1 - 2 player arcade shooting game for the TRS-80. Played from a first-person perspective, a number of alien creatures and spaceships move towards the player. The player must either fire upon and destroy the incoming threats or dodge them by moving to the side. The player has 3 ships, and it's game over when all are lost. A new ship is earned ever 10,000 points.
